directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in medium bowl. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Add tomatoes, pine nuts and cilantro to apricot mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
ingredients: 3 tablespoons finely chopped drained oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes
2 teaspoons chopped jalapeño chili with seeds
title: Sweet and Savory Pine Nut Relish
